title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Circular Economy and Miscellaneous
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Circular Economy and Miscellaneous
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Circular Economy and Miscellaneous 

Provisions Act 2022 (Commencement of Certain Provisions) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited circular economy miscellaneous provision act 2022 (commencement certain provisions) order 2022

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Circular Economy and Miscellaneous
heading: 2. The 23rd day of August 2022 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 23rd day of August 2022 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of the Circular Economy and Miscellaneous Provisions 
Act 2022 (No. 26 of 2022) shall come into operation: 

(a) Part 1, other than section 5; 

(b) Part 6. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

22 August 2022. 

EAMON RYAN 

Minister for the Environment, Climate and 
Communications. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 23rd August, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [420] 3
